mends. We should find Oskar up in the Atelier to receive the reward we were promised. We defeated Kerri's spirit, but Lady Jannath couldn't forgive Oskar and they parted ways. We should find Oskar up in the Atelier and ask for the reward we were promised. We defeated Kerri's spirit and convinced Lady Jannath to give Oskar another chance.
